==Requirements==

To use jSCEP, you will need to add the following JARs to your classpath:

   * [http://code.google.com/p/jscep/downloads/list?q=label:Featured%20type=Library Current jSCEP Release] 
   * Bouncy Castle "Provider" Library
   * Bouncy Castle "SMIME/CMS" Library

Bouncy Castle libraries are available from the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/latest_releases.html Bouncy Castle Latest Releases] page.


{{{
java -cp jSCEP-r43.jar:bcprov-jdk16-144.jar:bcmail-jdk16-144.jar ...
}}}

==Examples==

===Simple===

{{{
X500Principal subject = new X500Principal("CN=jscep.googlecode.com,O=Google Inc,L=Mountain View,ST=California,C=US");
URL url = new URL("http://www.example.org/scep/");
Proxy proxy = new Proxy(Proxy.Type.HTTP, new InetSocketAddress("proxy.example.org", 80));

Requester client = new Requester.Builder(url).proxy(proxy).subject(subject).build();
X509Certificate cert = client.enroll(); // Retrieve the signed certificate
KeyPair pair = client.getKeyPair();     // Retrieve the generated key pair
}}}

===Renew an Existing Certificate===

If the CA supports renewal, we can renew an existing certificate.

{{{
X509Certificate identity = ...;
KeyPair keyPair = ...;
URL url = new URL("http://www.example.org/scep/");

Requester client = new Requester.Builder(url).identity(identity).keyPair(keyPair).build();
identity = client.enroll();  // Retrieve the renewed certificate
}}}
